Package BobcatLib.Hardware.LedControllers

Class CANdleWrapper

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.LedControllers.CANdleWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
LedControllerIO
public class CANdleWrapper extends Object implements LedControllerIO
A wrapper class for interacting with a CANdle LED controller. This class allows controlling LED animations, checking for faults, and updating LED states.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    CANdleWrapper.BuiltInAnimations
    Enum representing the built-in LED animation types.
    static class 
    CANdleWrapper.CANdleIOInputs
    CANdle I/O inputs, representing the current state of the CANdle.
    static enum 
    CANdleWrapper.CANdleState
    Enum representing the various states of the CANdle.

      Boolean flag to determine if the CANdle is enabled.

      Alert for detecting sensor issues with CANdle.

  • Constructor Details

    • CANdleWrapper

      public CANdleWrapper(CANDeviceDetails details, int ledCount, String canbus)
      Constructor for the CANdleWrapper, initializing the CANdle hardware with the specified device details, LED count, and CAN bus.
      Parameters:
      details - The device details for the CANdle.
      ledCount - The number of LEDs to control.
      canbus - The CAN bus to use for communication with the device.

  • Method Details

    • updateInputs

      public void updateInputs(LedControllerIO.LedControllerIOInputs inputs)
      Updates the inputs for the LED controller I/O layer with the current CANdle state.
      Specified by:
      updateInputs in interface LedControllerIO
      Parameters:
      inputs - The CANdleIOInputs object to update.

    • setLEDs

      public void setLEDs(CANdleWrapper.CANdleState state)
      Sets the LED state to the specified CANdle state. This method will not automatically turn off the LEDs; it will persist until explicitly set to a different state.
      Specified by:
      setLEDs in interface LedControllerIO
      Parameters:
      state - The animation state to set on the LEDs.

    • setLEDs

      public void setLEDs(CANdleWrapper.CANdleState state, double seconds)
      Sets the LED state to the specified CANdle state and duration. This method allows specifying how long the animation should play.
      Specified by:
      setLEDs in interface LedControllerIO
      Parameters:
      state - The animation state to set on the LEDs.
      seconds - The duration in seconds for the animation.

    • periodic

      public void periodic()
      Periodically checks the timer and updates the LED state. This method is typically called in the robot's periodic function.
      Specified by:
      periodic in interface LedControllerIO

    • checkForFaults

      public void checkForFaults()
      Checks for any faults that may have occurred in the CANdle hardware. If any faults are detected, they are logged or alerted.
      Specified by:
      checkForFaults in interface LedControllerIO
